title: /setspawn没权限
author: Tommer
txt_content:
不止/setspawn没权限 builder上的负权限我也没权限

这是所有组的权限


groups:
  Moderator:
    default: false
    permissions: []
    inheritance:
    - builder
    - g:groupmanager_moderator
    - g:bukkit_moderator
    - g:essentials_moderator
    - g:towny_moderator
    - g:vanish_moderator
    info:
      build: true
      prefix: '&5'
      suffix: ''
  Owner:
    default: false
    permissions:
    - -vanish.*
    - '*'
    - authme.allowmultipleaccounts
    - essentials.powertool
    - +essentials.admin
    - +essentials.*
    - g:essentials_admin
    inheritance:
    - admin
    info:
      build: true
      prefix: '&b【腐竹】&c'
      suffix: ''
  Builder:
    default: true
    permissions:
    - +essentials.kits.tools
    - -essentials.ping
    - -essentials.me
    - -essentials.nick
    - -essentials.powertool
    - -coreprotect.lookup.command
    - -bukkit.help

    - -essentials.suicide
    - ActionHealth.Health

    - chestcommands.item.open2.yml
    - chestcommands.open.example.yml
    - chestcommands.open.fish.yml
    - chestcommands.open.home.yml
    - chestcommands.open.open2.yml
    - coreprotect.inspect
    - essentials.back
    - essentials.build.*
    - essentials.home
    - essentials.sethome
    - essentials.spawn
    - frameProtect.autoprotect.*
    - frameProtect.info.*

    - morefish.shop
    - morefish.top
    - ob.broadcast
    - ob.receive
    - playmoresounds.player
    - quickshop.create
    - quickshop.create.buy
    - quickshop.create.sell
    - quickshop.use
    - scriptblock.interact.use
    - scriptblock.walk.use
    - shopkeeper.trade
    - spigotping.ping
    - tgym.atm.use
    - at.use
    - pvpmanager.user

    - betterrtp.use

    - default
    - g:essentials_builder
    - g:towny_builder

      build: true
      prefix: '&2【玩家】'
      suffix: ''
  Admin:
    default: false
    permissions: []
    inheritance:
    - moderator
    - g:groupmanager_admin
    - g:bukkit_admin
    - g:essentials_admin
    - g:towny_admin
    - g:vanish_admin
    info:

    - g:essentials_default
    - g:towny_default

      prefix: '&e'
      suffix: ''



这是我个人的
  b99346ad-a525-34d7-96af-f8f82ed43624:
    lastname: Souir_Tommer
    group: Owner
    subgroups: []
    permissions:
    - authme.allowmultipleaccounts
    - essentials.*
    - essentials.admin
    info:
      prefix: '&b【腐竹】&c'

replies.author: cc7w
replies.txt_content:
- 是全否定
- 和 + 同时存在时优先判断 +

你给owner组加的是
    - +essentials.admin
    - +essentials.*
这个范围比
    - -essentials.ping
    - -essentials.me
    - -essentials.nick
    - -essentials.powertool
    - -coreprotect.lookup.command
    - -bukkit.help
    - -bukkit.?
    - -essentials.suicide
大

所以你需要给owner 这些 - 权限所对应的 + 权限
而不是泛泛只给一个 +essentials.*

replies.author: zjxx
replies.txt_content: 那你用mangaddp给组添加essentials.setspawn权限不就好了。。。
